description: Fire up the barbie for a delicious midweek dinner featuring Cajun spiced beef paired with a charred corn salad.
keywords: Salad,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Weeknight dinner,Jan Feb 2021,Corn,Spinach,Budget,Beef,Summer
name: Barbecued Beef & Charred Corn Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 lime, juiced (plus extra lime halves to serve)
1 avocado, deseeded, peeled, cut into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large frying pan over high heat. Add corn and cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until charred. Transfer to a large bowl. Season.

Meanwhile, heat a barbecue or chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Drizzle half the oil over beef. Sprinkle with Cajun seasoning and season with salt and pepper. Cook beef for 3 minutes on each side or until cooked to your liking. Transfer to a plate, cover loosely with foil and rest for 5 minutes. Thinly slice.
Combine corn, onion, chilli, lime juice and remaining oil in a bowl. Season. Divide spinach and rocket leaves, corn salad, beef and avocado among bowls. Serve with extra lime halves and bread.
